price: 54. Hadday naf walba oo dulmi fashay lahaan lahayd waxa dhulka yaalloo dhan, way isku furan lahayd, waxayna dareemi  qoomammo markay arkaan cadaabka, arrinkana waa la kala xukumi dhexdooda si caddaalad ah iyagoon la dulmineyn.
arabic: وَلَوۡ أَنَّ لِكُلِّ نَفۡسٖ ظَلَمَتۡ مَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَٱفۡتَدَتۡ بِهِۦۗ وَأَسَرُّواْ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَۖ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡقِسۡطِ وَهُمۡ لَا يُظۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaw anna likulli nafsin ẓalamat mā fī al-arḍi la-if'tadat bihi wa-asarrū al-nadāmata lammā ra-awū al-ʿadhāba waquḍiya baynahum bil-qis'ṭi wahum lā yuẓ'lamūna
